resources.string: Now we only have EOS tests
Account name illegal, it should be 12 characters and only contains a-z,1-5.
Please input correct account which you want query ABI.
Result had been copied to Clip board.
Invalid input,all informations should be filled.
Here is password for this wallet,please remember it,in other tests we may use this password to unlock the wallet to signature the transaction.:\n%1$s
No wallet now, you need to create a wallet first.
Input password to unlock this wallet.
Input the private key you wish to import.
How much RAM to buy.(in Byte)
How much RAM to sell (by Bytes)
How much RAM to sell (by kB)
How much EOS for CPU (only input integer,ex. "1")
How much EOS for NET (only input integer,ex. "1")
Please input the account name which you wish to browse.\nWill use get_abi to query the contracts supplied in this account.
get_abi failed, please retry.\n Maybe this account doesn't have contract.
No wallet created now,some operations need create wallet and import private key.\nYou can click "list wallets" to view current wallets and create a new one.
Invalid private key, please check and input carefully.

Get latest trade info from %1$s.
 price of 24h before:%2$s.
 price of now:%3$s. 
 highest price:%4$s.
 lowest price:%5$s.
 amount:%6$s.
 volumn:%7$s.

Balance of %1$s:%2$f
 Details:
 liquid eos:%3$f
 ram:%4$d Byte
 cpu:%5$f
 net:%6$f
 total eos:%7$f
 price:%8$f
Will query ram price every x minutes you entered.\n If it meets your designated price, will execute it.\n Attention:this task is in RAM, so if this app closed, it will not be executed anymore.
How many EOS to pay,must be xx.xxxx,ex. "10.0000",or it will fail.
Price you wish to buy RAM.(/kB)
Price you wish to sell RAM.(/kB)
How long time wish to retry(int,/minutes)

Liquid EOS:%1$f
 RAM:%2$f kB
 CPU:%3$f
 NET:%4$f
Need >0, and be integer, will try get ram price every x minutes.
Trying to buy %1$s EOS RAM on price %2$f EOS/kB,will retry every %3$d minutes
Trying to sell %1$f kBytes RAM on price %2$f EOS/kB,will retry every %3$d minutes.
Failed to get price from Huobi,If you are running this in China, you need to pass the Great Wall.
